title: Utersum
description: Utersum is a municipality on the island of Föhr, in the district of Nordfriesland, in Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. The municipality includes the hamlet of Hedehusum.
theme:
WINTER. Special gallery to set the mood
for snowy days
